org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Class INodeId

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.util.SequentialNumber
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.INodeId

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class INodeId
extends org.apache.hadoop.util.SequentialNumber
    An id which uniquely identifies an inode. Id 1 to 1000 are reserved for potential future usage. The id won't be recycled and is not expected to wrap around in a very long time. Root inode id is always 1001. Id 0 is used for backward compatibility support.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long GRANDFATHER_INODE_ID
      The inode id validation of lease check will be skipped when the request uses GRANDFATHER_INODE_ID for backward compatibility.
      static long LAST_RESERVED_ID
      The last reserved inode id.
      static long ROOT_INODE_ID

    • Field Detail

      • LAST_RESERVED_ID

        public static final long LAST_RESERVED_ID
        The last reserved inode id. InodeIDs are allocated from LAST_RESERVED_ID + 1.

    • Method Detail

      • checkId

        public static void checkId(long requestId,
           INode inode)
                    throws FileNotFoundException
        To check if the request id is the same as saved id. Don't check fileId with GRANDFATHER_INODE_ID for backward compatibility.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
